title: The Girl I love: music video for the band Positronic
creator_contributor_role: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM), production company
abstract: 3D animated music video created by a student for his band
description: This animated music video was created in 3D studio Max for student's band - Positronic. Although it was the first time that he had used this software, he makes the most of simple scenes, metaphorical imagery and 3D ariel effects to effectively communicate the song's message - A small town girl leaves her home to find fame and fortune in the big city, leaving beind her boyfriend who must come to terms with her departure.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005723; Swinburne EDIM Graduate Screening 2002 - Pixel-pusher; Active; 2002
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
